Name: Silence in the Dark
About the game: Jon Morgan mid 30s ex-cop now private detective. Stumbles on one of a kind case that turns his world around. After finding a book in one of main suspects room. He brings the book home and tries to figure out what is going on. The game begins in a abandoned town called 'Lamias Wake'. And you as a player have no memory how or when did you came here. Solve puzzles, survive, hunt or be hunted. Answer answers that left unanswered.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Silence in the Dark? Check out the release date (Nov 10, 2020), developer insights from Grytis, and a complete game summary.
